name: Mindsetmanage
description: Mindset was born out of frustration with the inability of existing employee engagement solutions to deliver anything more than top-level feedback to executives, and with the frequent failed initiatives intended to change leadership behavior that instead collected dust on a shelf. This frustration lead to Johan Poolman teaming up with Dr Dieter Veldsman to develop the Flow@Work employee engagement model, which ultimately morphed into a team of HR tech and startup veterans, industrial psychologists, software engineers, and data scientists who share the common belief that organizations can truly drive sustainable employee engagement - provided they are given the right data, tools, and know-how. With this as our focus, Mindset is now an international team with big plans, and our vision has not changed: we still believe that driving sustainable engagement requires the right information, in the right hands, at the right time. Follow our story as we continue to grow, driving innovation and helping to build workplaces that we as employees - and as people - would be proud to be a part of.
Headline: Engage EX - empowering you with the data, tools, and know-how to drive sustainable engagement and inclusion
ShortDescription: Empowering organizations with the developmental and real-time feedback tools to transform & optimize the employee experience at all touchpoints of the employee lifecycle.

Highlights.name: Embed engagement holistically throughout your organization
Highlights.description: Decentralize and embed engagement holistically as a sustainable way-of-life at your organization – from leaders at all levels down to individual employees

Highlights.name: Develop your talent with tailored 360-developmental programs
Highlights.description: Build effective leaders with leadership and developmental 360-degree assessments, with automated, rule-based feedback reports for individuals and cohorts

enhanced_description: Mindsetmanage, operating under its Engage EX brand, offers a comprehensive Employee Experience (EX) solution designed to address the limitations of traditional engagement tools. It provides organizations with the essential data, tools, and know-how to drive sustainable employee engagement and inclusion. Developed from the Flow@Work employee engagement model by a multidisciplinary team including HR tech veterans, industrial psychologists, software engineers, and data scientists, Mindsetmanage empowers organizations with developmental and real-time feedback capabilities. Its core vision is to optimize the employee experience across all touchpoints of the employee lifecycle by delivering the right information into the right hands at the right time, fostering workplaces where employees are proud to contribute.
